---
title: "Report for the results"
output: html_document
params:
  alpha_draw: NA
  graph_data: NA
---

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(xtable)
alpha <- params$alpha_draw
edges <- params$graph_data$edges
nodes <- params$graph_data$nodes
edges
nodes
```

```{r}
kable(edges, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
kable(nodes, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE)
```
